markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _boreal staff_ is chiseled from a cylinder of ice to form a spiky, jagged icicle, its surface gleaming with the colors of the northern lights. It gives the air around you a distinct chill. When used as a weapon, a _boreal staff_ is a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Boreal Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 1.1 **Price** 500 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_ray of frost_](/Spells.aspx?ID=245)
  • **1st** [_chilling spray_](/Spells.aspx?ID=678), [_snowball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=540)
  • **2nd** _chilling spray_, _snowball_
  • **3rd** _chilling spray_, [_elemental absorption_](/Spells.aspx?ID=901) (water only)
Boreal Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 1.1 **Price** 2,750 gp **Bulk** 1 --- When used as a weapon, this is a _+2 striking [frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=296) staff_.
  • **4th** _chilling spray_, [_ice storm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=695)
  • **5th** [_cone of cold_](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [_mantle of the frozen heart_](/Spells.aspx?ID=946)
Boreal Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 1.1 **Price** 13,500 gp **Bulk** 1 --- When used as a weapon, this is a _+3 greater striking frost staff_. The additional cold damage from the activation ignores cold resistance.
  • **6th** _cone of cold_
  • **7th** _cone of cold_, [_frigid flurry_](/Spells.aspx?ID=916)
name: Boreal Staff (Major)
